change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 31/2018, effective March 7, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Exception to temporary industrial use permit requirements
bcl:section.bcl:text: An exception to the temporary industrial use permit requirements of section 921 (11) and (14) of the Local Government Act is made in relation to the City of Coquitlam on the terms and conditions set out in section 2.
The City of Coquitlam may issue a temporary industrial use permit in accordance with the exception

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: all or part of that land described as Lot A, District Lots 16, 17, 18 and 48, Group 1 New Westminster District Plan LMP 17876 (Parcel Identifier: 018-882-897), and
activities related to the construction of the Port Mann Bridge,

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for a term no longer than 5 years, and

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Community Charter, S.B.C. 2003, c. 26, section 281; Local Government Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 323, section 921]
